product_name: Blackburn Voyager 3.3 / Mars 1.0 Combo Bike Light Set
long_description: The Blackburn Voyager 3.3 / Mars 1.0 Combo bike light set provides a potent, bright combination at a great value, improving your visibility while riding! Voyager 3.3 white front light has a compact design that uses 3 high-powered white LEDs for a total output of 17 lumens; choose between steady or flash mode. Run time for the Voyager 3.3 is 68 hours on steady, 156 hours on flash. Mars 1.0 red rear light uses 4 superbright LEDs to ensure excellent visibility. On steady mode, the Mars 1.0 has a 150 run time; on flash it has a 240 hour run time. Both lights attach to the bike easily and without tools, thanks to adjustable brackets with quick-release mounts. Blackburn Voyager 3.3 front light runs on 4 AAA batteries (included); Mars 1.0 rear light runs on 2 AAA batteries (included).
short_description: The Blackburn Voyager 3.3 / Mars 1.0 Combo bike light set provides a potent, bright combination at a great value, improving your visibility while riding!
